title: Which technology is on demand in today's market? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maintenance. With the last few decades' worth of pumping out advanced degrees, there is a shortage of skilled plumbers, electricians, and people in general willing to get their hands dirty in maintaining the massive infrastructure built over the last fifty years or so. Infrastructure that is now ageing and beginning to fall to pieces, for which we quite frankly don't have the money to simply replace. It needs to be maintained and repaired, and costs for those kind of services have risen more over the last ten years than what lawyers, accountants and engineers have - seeing as they have slowly saturated their own market.

Technology when we talk of technology there are many things that come in someones mind , as now we all are surrounded with the world of upgrading technology from latest mobile phones , laptops and now a days even things are becoming automatic. Technology is something that keeps on increasing that by day the main aim of any technology is to make individuals life easier and to fulfill customers wants and demands. As in talk to technology in the case of mobile phones iphone (apple) is going rapidly and even many other companies like lava, gionee are also launching there new phone with latest technology with minimum cost.
